Python middleware lifecycle
The order of middleware lifecycle hooks is as follows:
1. [transform](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-input)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-input)
[input](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-input)
4. [before](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-memoization)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-memoization)
[memoization](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-memoization)
7. [after](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-memoization)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-memoization)
[memoization](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-memoization)
10. [before](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-execution)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-execution)
[execution](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-execution)
13. [after](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-execution)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-execution)
[execution](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-execution)
16. [transform](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-output)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-output)
[output](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-output)
19. [before](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-response)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-response)
[response](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-response)
All of these functions may be called multiple times in a single function run. For example, if your function has 2 steps then all of the hooks will run 3 times (once for each step and once for the function).
Additionally, there are two hooks when sending events:
1. [before](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[send](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[events](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
6. [after](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[send](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[events](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
transform
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-input)
[input](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-input)
Called when receiving a request from Inngest and before running any functions. Commonly used to mutate data sent by Inngest, like decryption.
Arguments
- Name `ctx` Type Context Required required Description `ctx` argument passed to Inngest functions.
- Name `function` Type Function Required required Description Inngest function object.
- Name `steps` Type StepMemos Required required Description Memoized step data.

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
before
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-memoization)
[memoization](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-memoization)
Called before checking memoized step data.

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
after
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-memoization)
[memoization](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-memoization)
Called after exhausting memoized step data.

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
before
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-execution)
[execution](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-execution)
Called before executing "new code". For example,
```
before_execution
```
is called after returning the last memoized step data, since function-level code after that step is "new".

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
after
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-execution)
[execution](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-execution)
Called after executing "new code".

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
transform
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-output)
[output](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#transform-output)
Called after a step or function returns. Commonly used to mutate data before sending it back to Inngest, like encryption.
Arguments
- Name `result` Type TransformOutputResult Required required Description Show nested properties

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
before
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-response)
[response](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-response)
Called before sending a response back to Inngest.
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[send](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
[events](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#before-send-events)
Called before sending events to Inngest.
Arguments
- Name `events` Type list[Event] Required required Description Events to send.

Python middleware lifecycle
Hook reference
after
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[send](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[_](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
[events](\docs\reference\python\middleware\lifecycle#after-send-events)
Called after sending events to Inngest.
Arguments
- Name `result` Type SendEventsResult Required required Description Show nested properties
